content: Evaluate the purpose of the image
title: Decision Tree

children.content: Prepares student for activity or represents a concept?
children.title: Icon
Icon

children.title: Provides information

children.content: Attempt OCR or type the text

children.title: Provides information with no embedded text

children.title: Provides information with no embedded text
children.content: describe the image, select the go button for resources on providing image descriptions

children.title: Provides information with no embedded text
children.content: Requires lengthy description?

children.title: image requires a lengthy description

children.title: image does not require a lengthy description
children.content: Does the image convey an object(s) with 3-dimensional characteristics?

children.title: image does not convery an object with 3-dimesional characteristics
children.content: provide a 2 or 2.5-dimesnional tactile graphic

labels.text: The image shows processes or stages and has moveable parts
The image shows processes or stages only

children.title: image with 3-dimensional characteristics
children.content: You will need to provide a tactile graphic that shows the overall processes or stages as well as a 3D model or real object for each aspect that conveys an object with 3D characteristics
